description: A short description of the post.

Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

title: Welcome to Kristina's Blog
description: Detailing my academic projects in the course of pursuing a M.S. in Data Science and Computation for Social Sciences at UMass Amherst
contents:
Welcome!
Hi! I’m Kristina Becvar, a graduate student in the Department of Social and Behavioral Sciences at University of Massachusetts Amherst. I’ve decided to start blogging to document my learning and development in data analysis.
Feel free to pull up a chair, leave a comment, and join me so that we can navigate some things together.
